name: Nathanael Boehm
message: Yup, the Internet Filter is about as much a waste of money as the National Broadband Network - although an added waste of the NBN is that while they're trying to increase bandwidth and speed across the country with one hand they're then slowing it back down with the Internet Clean Feed Filter with the other hand. I don't know how you can get any dumber than that. Good post! Totally agree.
